de.griefed.monitoring.controllers

Class SystemInformationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.griefed.monitoring.controllers.SystemInformationController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin(origins="{*}")
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/v1")
public class SystemInformationController
extends java.lang.Object
    RestController providing endpoints for retrieving information about the host and configured agents, if any.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private InformationService INFORMATION_SERVICE 
      private ApplicationProperties PROPERTIES 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SystemInformationController(InformationService injectedInformationService, ApplicationProperties injectedApplicationProperties)
      Constructor responsible for DI.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> getAgentsInformation()
      GET endpoint for retrieving information about all configured agents.
      de.griefed.monitoring.agent must be set to false in order for this endpoint to return information, otherwise a 400-error is returned.
      See CpuComponent, DiskComponent, HostComponent, OsComponent, RamComponent for details about the information gathered.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> getHostInformation()
      GET endpoint for retrieving information about the host this instance is running on.
      See CpuComponent, DiskComponent, HostComponent, OsComponent, RamComponent for details about the information gathered.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> getMode()
      GET endpoint for retrieving the mode this instance is running in.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

public SystemInformationController(InformationService injectedInformationService,

    • Method Detail

      • getMode

        @CrossOrigin(origins="{*}")
 @RequestMapping(value="mode",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> getMode()
        GET endpoint for retrieving the mode this instance is running in. Returns, as JSON, the mode currently active.
        Returns:
        String. {"mode": true} if agent, {"mode": false} if monitor.

      • getHostInformation

        @CrossOrigin(origins="{*}")
 @RequestMapping(value="host",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> getHostInformation()
        GET endpoint for retrieving information about the host this instance is running on.
        See CpuComponent, DiskComponent, HostComponent, OsComponent, RamComponent for details about the information gathered.
        Returns:
        String in JSON format. Information about the host of this instance.

      • getAgentsInformation

        @CrossOrigin(origins="{*}")
 @RequestMapping(value="agents",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> getAgentsInformation()
        GET endpoint for retrieving information about all configured agents.
        de.griefed.monitoring.agent must be set to false in order for this endpoint to return information, otherwise a 400-error is returned.
        See CpuComponent, DiskComponent, HostComponent, OsComponent, RamComponent for details about the information gathered.
        Returns:
        String in JSON format. Information about all configured agents.
